title: Gift for gift
body:
Why are the trades so unfair... Why do I have bad luck. 
Bandit sivir for Nurse akali
robot amumu for gentleman cho'gath
TPA nunu for poolparty lee

why do I always get the butt of the trades

replies.body:
Erm, I don't believe there is an SKT Nunu skin?

The skins are completely random so just hope, and cross your fingers!
